channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12010] Use TableName.META_TABLE_NAME instead of indirectly from HTableDescriptor
item.description: Currently code accessed meta table name via HTableDescriptor.META_TABLEDESC.getTableName(), but we have TableName.META_TABLE_NAME already. It is better to use from one place.
item.summary: Use TableName.META_TABLE_NAME instead of indirectly from HTableDescriptor

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12669535/12010.patch
against trunk revision .
ATTACHMENT ID: 12669535

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 15 new or modified tests.

-1 javac. The patch appears to cause mvn compile goal to fail.

Compilation errors resume:

nice cleanup, TestLogRollingNoCluster has a missing TableName include
Thank you Matteo Bertozzi, that exactly why it failed. Fixed.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12669553/HBASE-12010.patch
against trunk revision .
ATTACHMENT ID: 12669553

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 15 new or modified tests.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

-1 javadoc. The javadoc tool appears to have generated 2 warning messages.

-1 findbugs. The patch appears to introduce 1 new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.
